column3: str

Kageel Ja seeks your aid in further improving Gok Golma.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested materials to Kageel Ja.

<If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),16))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Mine <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> near the dirigible landing<Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to Kageel Ja</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),17))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Gather <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> near Yak Awak Tsoly<Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to Kageel Ja</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),18))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Catch <SheetEn(Item,1,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> at Yak Awak Tsoly<Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to Kageel Ja</If><Else/></If></If></If>.
Things around here have become so much busier than when we began, eh, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>?
Even the Brethren of Br'aax have been known to stop by and stay awhile. It's proven a great spot for them to interact with our customers from Mamook.

Which is why I want to go one step further and make of the gainery a place where everyone can feel welcomed and relaxed. To that end, I spoke with one of our visitors and learned that the Xbr'aal use a pleasing aroma to create a restful atmosphere.
The aromatic materials you procured for us were well praised by the Brethren of Br'aax─the scent made them feel right at home.
As lovely as the aroma is, however, it only lasts for so long... We'll have to make gathering fresh batches a part of our regular duties.
Should you happen to be in the area, I'm told you can find deposits of aromatic salt north of the dirigible landing. A few pinches should be enough for us to create a welcoming fragrance.
Should you happen to be in the area, I'm told you can find sweet-smelling white flowers near Yak Awak Tsoly. A few blooms should be enough for us to create a welcoming fragrance.
Should you happen to be in the area, I'm told you can catch a species of sweetfish at Yak Awak Tsoly. One should be enough for us to create a welcoming fragrance.
Oh, and be sure to take a supply of golden stonefly nymphs to use as bait.
If you've time on your hands, the Xbr'aal are said to favor the scent of a certain aromatic salt found north of the dirigible landing.
If you've time on your hands, the Xbr'aal are said to favor the scent of a certain white flower found near Yak Awak Tsoly.
If you've time on your hands, the Xbr'aal are said to favor the scent of a certain species of sweetfish found at Yak Awak Tsoly. You should be able to catch them using golden stonefly nymphs as bait.
Can I assume you've brought our aromatic ingredient?
I thought as much! I smelled such a pleasant scent as you approached.
...Hm, does that mean both Xbr'aal and Mamool Ja are fond of similar smells? We spent so many years in conflict over our differences, but I wonder what else we might have in common.
Appreciating a calming fragrance is something I'd never considered until the brethren began their visits. Each of our cultures has much to learn from the other.
